text: Samuel George Armstrong Vestey, 3rd Baron Vestey, (19 March 1941 â€“ February 2021) was a British peer, landowner, and businessman. Lord Vestey was Master of the Horse to The Queen. He was Chairman of the Vestey Holdings. Vestey was appointed as a permanent Lord-in-waiting to The Queen in August 2019. His death was announced on 4 February 2021, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United Kingdom Barons Category:Businesspeople from London
title: Samuel Vestey, 3rd Baron Vestey
